content.rendered:
Pearl Residences, Pearl View Estate, Enugu

Our residences were brought on board as part of our commitment to complete at least 70% of our estates in the next three years.
Our reasoning is that by surrounding our estates with cutting-edge infrastructure, we will be able to attract people to live in them.

The atmosphere created by our residential buildings will provide and radiate the sense of style and glamour you have always desired in a home. This residence guarantees access to high-quality living conditions and comfort.

2 BEDROOM TERRACE HOUSE

The 2 Bedroom Terrace Apartments are located within Pearl View Estate, Enugu, an exclusively serviced estate in the heart of Enugu, Nigeria’s coal city. The estate is a collection of upscale contemporary terrace residences that are exclusively yours.

The two-bedroom terrace buildings are ideal for a small family. The terraces include a living room, dining room, pantry, private lounge, box room, master bedroom with walk-in closet, entrance porch, visitors’ toilet, and all rooms are en-suite.

Title: Certificate of Occupancy

Neighborhood:

  • Akanu Ibiam International Airport
  • Caritas University
  • Emenite Aluminium Company

Residence Facilities:

  • Well paved external areas with exotic Horticulture
  • Standby Generator o Security and Intercom System
  • Spacious Individual Parking Space
  • Estate Management Service
  • Waste Disposal Unit
  • Central water treatment plant
  • Central security system

Price:

  • Outright: ₦24,241,408.10
  • 12 Months: ₦26,665,548.91 (Initial deposit of ₦5.3 Million)
  • 18 Months: ₦27,998,826.36 (Initial deposit of ₦5.5 Million)
  • 24 Months: ₦29,398,767.68 (Initial deposit of ₦5.8 Million)

Pearl Residence Subscription Form

1 file(s) 1.38 MB
